name: Face with Rolling Eyes
baseMeaning: A yellow face with eyes rolled upward, expressing contempt, boredom, or exasperation.
tldr: Universal eye-roll meaning annoyance, dismissiveness, or 'here we go again'.

contextMeanings.meaning: Dismissing someone's point or expressing contempt.
Mocking something seen as obvious or eye-roll worthy.
Expressing disbelief or 'can you believe this'.

platformNotes.note: Common for expressing frustration with news, takes, or people.
Can escalate tension quickly - clearly signals displeasure.
Generally too negative for workplace communication.

generationalNotes.note: Standard emoji for expressing 'ugh' or 'not this again'.
Frequently used to express frustration or dismissiveness.
May find it too overtly rude or disrespectful.

warnings.title: Clearly negative
warnings.description: This emoji is unambiguously dismissive. Use with caution as it can escalate conflicts.
